    • Uses of ApplicationCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.account

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account with parameters of type ApplicationCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApplicationList Account.getApplications(ApplicationCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of the applications that the account may login to that match the specified query criteria.

    • Uses of ApplicationCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application that return ApplicationCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ApplicationCriteria Applications.criteria()
      Returns a new ApplicationCriteria instance to use to formulate an Application query.
      ApplicationCriteria ApplicationCriteria.orderByDescription()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by application description.
      ApplicationCriteria ApplicationCriteria.orderByName()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by application name.
      ApplicationCriteria ApplicationCriteria.orderByStatus()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by application status.
      static ApplicationCriteria Applications.where(Criterion criterion)
      Creates a new ApplicationCriteria instance using the specified criterion as the first query condition.
